description:
11.280 vmafmotion
Obtain the average VMAF motion score of a video.
It is one of the component metrics of VMAF.

The obtained average motion score is printed through the logging system.

The filter accepts the following options:


Example:

ffmpeg -i ref.mpg -vf vmafmotion -f null -

stats_file.description: If specified, the filter will use the named file to save the motion score of each frame with respect to the previous frame. When filename equals '-', the data is sent to standard output.

source:
11.280 vmafmotion

Obtain the average VMAF motion score of a video. It is one of the component metrics of VMAF.

The obtained average motion score is printed through the logging system.

The filter accepts the following options:

stats_file

If specified, the filter will use the named file to save the motion score of each frame with respect to the previous frame. When filename equals "-" the data is sent to standard output.

Example: 

ffmpeg -i ref.mpg -vf vmafmotion -f null -
